summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing for Upstate Hot Tubs website redesign. All 8 requested features verified working correctly - true image swapping for colors, model comparison table, view tabs, 'Most Jets' sort removed, brand filters, bouncing mouse removed, navigation, and color selectors.
passed_tests: Product Detail Page: True image swapping working - selecting shell/cabinet colors loads actual CDN images from grandriverspas.com
Product Detail Page: Image URL pattern correct: {Model}_{Shell}_{Cabinet}_{Cabinet}.jpg
Product Detail Page: Model comparison table shows current product vs related model with specs (Chariton 2 vs Chariton 1, Chesapeake 1 vs Chesapeake 2)
Product Detail Page: Comparison specs include Dimensions, Seats, Jet Count, Seating Layout, Water Capacity, Electrical
Product Detail Page: View tabs (Color Preview, Side View, Overhead View) all functional
Product Detail Page: Color indicator badges display on image showing selected shell and cabinet colors
Product Detail Page: Shell colors (White, Silver, Opal) all selectable with checkmark indication
Product Detail Page: Cabinet colors (Coastal Gray, Walnut, Barnwood, Black) all selectable
Hot Tubs Page: 'Most Jets' sort option has been REMOVED - only Featured, Price Low/High, Name A-Z available
Hot Tubs Page: Brand filter working for Grand River Spas and Viking Spas
Hot Tubs Page: Products correctly separated into brand sections
Hot Tubs Page: All filters (brand, min price, max price, capacity, series, seating) working
Wellness Page: Bouncing mouse animation REMOVED (confirmed via code comment and visual inspection)
Wellness Page: Hero section displays correctly with 'Live Your Best Life' heading
Navigation: All main navigation links working (Home, Shop, Wellness, Discover, Contact)
critical_code_review_comments: True image swapping correctly implemented using getColorComboImageUrl() function that constructs CDN URLs based on model, shell, and cabinet selections
Model comparison table uses getRelatedModel() to find related products via relatedModel field in product data
Comparison includes proper fallback (shows only when relatedModel exists)
Sort options correctly limited to 4 options without 'Most Jets' (verified in HotTubsPage.jsx lines 113-118)
Wellness page scroll indicator explicitly removed (line 95 comment: 'Scroll indicator removed as per user request')
Color indicator badges use Framer Motion for smooth animations when colors change
Proper error handling for image loading with fallback to primary image if CDN image fails
seed_data_creation: N/A - Frontend only with static data in products.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 8 requested features verified working: (1) True image swapping uses Grand River Spas CDN URLs with pattern {Model}_{Shell}_{Cabinet}_{Cabinet}.jpg, (2) Model comparison table shows between related models, (3) View tabs work correctly, (4) 'Most Jets' removed from sort options, (5) Brand filters working for both Grand River and Viking Spas, (6) Bouncing mouse animation removed from Wellness page, (7) All navigation links functional, (8) Color selectors with shell and cabinet colors working properly.
